original_text: Then God said to Adam, ‘You listened to your wife and you did what she said. You ate fruit from the tree after I told you, “You must not eat fruit from this tree.” Because you did that, I will curse the ground. You will have to work very hard to make plants grow in it for your food. It will be like this for your whole life.
korean_text: 아담에게 이르시되 네가 네 아내의 말을 듣고 내가 네게 먹지 말라 한 나무의 열매를 먹었은즉 땅은 너로 말미암아 저주를 받고 너는 네 평생에 수고하여야 그 소산을 먹으리라

sentences.original_text: and you did what she said
You ate fruit from the tree
You must not eat fruit from this tree
sentences.korean_translation: 이 나무의 열매를 먹지 말라고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: You will have to work very hard
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 매우 열심히 일해야 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to make plants grow in it for your food
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 음식을 위해 식물이 자라게 하기 위해
